meta.title: Op. Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz - Orthopedics and Traumatology
meta.description: Op. Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz - Orthopedics and Traumatology specialist with 25+ years of experience. Specializing in arthroscopic surgery, joint replacements, and sports injuries.

intro.title: Professional Medical Care
intro.description: Op. Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz is an Orthopedics and Traumatology specialist with over 25 years of experience. He provides the highest quality medical care to help improve your quality of life.

cta.title: Book an Appointment
cta.description: Contact us for professional advice regarding your health concerns.

symptoms.title: Symptoms & Treatment
symptoms.subtitle: Interactive Body Map
symptoms.description: Click on any body part to learn about common orthopedic conditions and treatment options.

bodyMap.title: Interactive Body Map
bodyMap.instruction: Click on any highlighted area to explore symptoms and treatments

shoulder.title: Shoulder Problems
shoulder.description: Rotator cuff injuries, impingement, and shoulder instability.

elbow.title: Elbow Conditions
elbow.description: Tennis elbow, fractures, and ligament injuries.

hip.title: Hip Problems
hip.description: Pediatric hip conditions, arthritis, and hip replacement.

knee.title: Knee Conditions
knee.description: Meniscus tears, ACL injuries, and knee replacements.

pediatric-orthopedics.title: Pediatric Orthopedics
pediatric-orthopedics.description: Developmental dysplasia, clubfoot, and pediatric trauma.

shoulder.title: Shoulder Pain & Conditions
shoulder.overview: The shoulder is one of the most mobile joints in the body, making it susceptible to various injuries and conditions. Our comprehensive approach addresses both acute injuries and chronic conditions.

causes.title: Common Causes
items: Fractures of the shoulder blade, collarbone, or upper arm

symptoms.title: Symptoms
items: Pain that worsens with overhead activities

shoulder.drTreatment: Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz specializes in both arthroscopic and open shoulder surgeries, utilizing the latest minimally invasive techniques to ensure faster recovery and optimal outcomes.

elbow.title: Elbow Conditions & Treatment
elbow.overview: Elbow problems can significantly impact daily activities and sports performance. We provide comprehensive care for both acute injuries and chronic conditions affecting the elbow joint.

symptoms.title: Symptoms
items: Pain on the outside or inside of the elbow

elbow.drTreatment: Dr. Eryanılmaz employs both conservative and surgical approaches, with expertise in arthroscopic techniques for faster recovery and minimal scarring.

wristHand.title: Wrist & Hand Conditions
wristHand.overview: Hand and wrist injuries can severely impact daily function. Our specialized care addresses everything from acute fractures to chronic conditions like carpal tunnel syndrome.

causes.title: Common Conditions
items: Arthritis of the hand and wrist

wristHand.drTreatment: Dr. Eryanılmaz provides comprehensive hand and wrist care, utilizing microsurgical techniques when necessary for optimal functional outcomes.

hip.title: Hip Problems & Treatment
hip.overview: Hip conditions can affect patients of all ages, from pediatric developmental issues to adult arthritis. Our comprehensive approach ensures appropriate treatment for each age group and condition.

symptoms.title: Symptoms
items: Stiffness and reduced range of motion

pediatric.title: Pediatric Hip Care
pediatric.description: Special expertise in treating developmental hip dysplasia, Perthes disease, and other pediatric hip conditions with age-appropriate techniques.

hip.drTreatment: Dr. Eryanılmaz has extensive experience in both adult and pediatric hip surgery, with over 500 pediatric hip procedures performed throughout his career.

knee.title: Knee Pain & Conditions
knee.overview: The knee is the largest joint in the body and bears significant stress during daily activities. Our comprehensive knee care addresses sports injuries, arthritis, and complex reconstructions.
knee.drTreatment: Dr. Eryanılmaz has performed over 10,000 knee replacement surgeries and 5,000 arthroscopic procedures, making him one of the most experienced knee surgeons in the region.

footAnkle.title: Foot & Ankle Conditions
footAnkle.overview: Foot and ankle problems can significantly impact mobility and quality of life. We provide comprehensive care for both pediatric conditions like clubfoot and adult injuries.

causes.title: Common Conditions
items: Arthritis of the foot and ankle

pediatric.title: Clubfoot Expertise
pediatric.description: Dr. Eryanılmaz has successfully treated over 350 cases of clubfoot using the Ponseti method, achieving excellent functional outcomes.

footAnkle.drTreatment: Specialized care for both pediatric foot deformities and adult foot and ankle injuries, with emphasis on preserving function and mobility.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Orthopedics
pediatric.overview: Children's orthopedic conditions require specialized knowledge and age-appropriate treatment approaches. Our pediatric orthopedic care addresses developmental, traumatic, and congenital conditions.

hip.title: Hip Dysplasia
hip.description: Early detection and treatment of developmental hip dysplasia using Pavlik harness, casting, or surgical correction as needed.

clubfoot.title: Clubfoot Correction
clubfoot.description: Comprehensive clubfoot treatment using the Ponseti method, including casting, tenotomy, and bracing protocols.

trauma.title: Pediatric Trauma
trauma.description: Specialized care for children's fractures, considering growth plates and long-term development.

pediatric.drTreatment: Dr. Eryanılmaz has extensive experience in pediatric orthopedics with over 500 pediatric hip surgeries and 350 clubfoot corrections, ensuring the best outcomes for young patients.

philosophy.title: Medical Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe that each patient is unique and deserves personalized medical care. My approach combines the use of cutting-edge technology with sincere and transparent communication with patients.

clinic.title: About Our Clinic
clinic.content: At Medera Hospital, our clinic is equipped with the latest technology to provide the highest quality medical services in orthopedics and traumatology.

success.title: Thank You!
